backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing file, folder, profile, notes, and mission management with authorization, storage mixins, and various query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing swipe-gesture UI features, associated frontend files, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping many frontend paths to short functional descriptions of each component or utility.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing creation and verification of a Draft baseline synced exactly to Live version 114.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice stating that no code changes are allowed until explicit user approval after restoring Live v114.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching and network-first caching logic.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that the frontend fully matches Live version 114, covering authentication, actor init, UI, and configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app managing theme, providers, and conditional intro screen after login.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed actor initialization errors with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG camera icon with hover animations and visual effects.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom divider line for UI decoration.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot open externally, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog that previews files by type and provides actions like open, download, send to folder, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Upload section handling file input, progress tracking, and upload mutations with status checks and toasts.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that displays a folder icon and triggers folder-related actions.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with backend mutations and swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Fullscreen viewer for browsing files with swipe navigation and actions like download, share, delete, and send to folder.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Gallery view displaying files or folder contents, supporting long‑press selection, file actions, and fullscreen viewing.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with theme toggle, authentication menu, and progress bar integration.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Displays a timed welcome animation and triggers onComplete after finishing.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that initiates Internet Identity login and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission editor allowing task management, title editing, and save/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with tasks, including add/remove and validation logic.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions view with animated icon states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Manages listing, creating, selecting, and deleting missions with navigation to detail view.
frontend/src/components/NotesButton.tsx: Floating button that opens the notes view with a stylized icon.
frontend/src/components/NotesFullScreenV: Full‑screen notes manager supporting creation, editing, deletion, and mobile editor flow.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog component to move files into folders or back to the main collection using folder queries and mutations.
frontend/src/components/SwipeRevealRow.t: Swipeable row component that reveals action buttons on touch drag with open/close state handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a unified upload progress bar showing total progress and file count when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with branding, description, and login button for first‑time or signed‑out users.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor creation with retries, error handling, and identity-based initialization.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context tracking upload batches, progress updates, and completion with derived totals and counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that builds and caches an actor via react-query, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/clear functions, and persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting missions via the backend actor with caching and optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on notes, including sorting, invalidation, and legacy compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for managing files and folders, supporting pagination, folder operations, and optimistic folder rename updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and component styling tokens.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main page handling authentication states and rendering file gallery, folders, notes, and missions views with related UI controls.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines user-facing actor initialization messages and helpers to classify IC-related errors including not-ready, init-failure, invalid admin token, and stopped canister.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities to open URLs in new tabs and to download files via blob links.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open (viewer, office preview, or download) based on MIME type and helper predicates.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes MIME types into previewable groups and returns human‑readable file labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Formats timestamps into relative phrases like minutes/hours ago or a short date.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash‑based routing awareness.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, OKLCH color mappings, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list enumerating all frontend files that define the Live version 114 baseline for parity validation.
project_state.json: Describes overall project state, features, and metadata for the MyGallery PWA backed by an IC canister.
